title: A qualitative study of work-related musculoskeletal disorders among midwives in selected hospitals in Ho municipality, Ghana
content:
Publication date: 15 June 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 11

Author(s): Anita Fafa Dartey, Vivian Tackie, Comfort Worna Lotse, John Yesuohene Ofori, Esi Twiba Mother Bansford, Princella Yayra Hamenu
